name: BR
title: Bioretention
description: Shallow, open channels that are designed to reduce runoff and improve water quality by intentionally promoting the slowing and filtering of polluted runoff.

name: GS
title: Grassed Swales
description: Shallow, open channels that are designed remove pollutants such as sediment by physically straining and filtering water through vegetation within the channel.

name: PP
title: Porous Pavement
description: A type of pavement that allows stormwater and snow melt to pass through voids in the paved surface and infiltrate into the sub-base and into the underlying soil.

name: VF
title: Vegetated Filterstrip
description: Broad, sloped, vegetated areas that enhance storm water treatment and conveyance by treating sheet flow from adjacent surfaces.
